title: CR-042 SSE Transport Qualification Gap and CR-043 Unauthorized Modification

comment:
COMPLIANT. Verified per SOP-003 requirements:

FRONTMATTER:
- title: CR-042 SSE Transport Qualification Gap and CR-043 Unauthorized Modification - Present and valid
- revision_summary: N/A for v0.1 initial draft

REQUIRED SECTIONS (SOP-003 Section 5):
- Section 1 (Purpose): Present - identifies two quality events
- Section 2 (Scope): Present - contains Context, Deviation Type, Systems/Documents Affected
- Section 3 (Background): Present - expected vs actual behavior, discovery, timeline
- Section 4 (Description of Deviations): Present - facts, observations, evidence
- Section 5 (Impact Assessment): Present - systems, documents, other impacts
- Section 6 (Root Cause Analysis): Present - two root causes identified with contributing factors
- Section 7 (Remediation Plan): Present - CAPA table with two CAPAs
- Section 8 (Execution Comments): Present - template for execution phase
- Section 9 (Execution Summary): Present - template for execution phase
- Section 10 (References): Present - governing SOPs and related documents listed

DEVIATION IDENTIFICATION: Adequate
- Deviation 1: CR-042 qualification gap (code non-functional despite passing qualification)
- Deviation 2: Unauthorized qms-cli modification during CR-043 execution

ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS: Adequate
- RC-1: Inadequate verification testing for CR-042
- RC-2: No separation between test and production code access

CAPAs: Appropriate
- CAPA-001: Corrective - requalification CR for SSE transport (addresses RC-1)
- CAPA-002: Preventive - containerization initiative provides access controls (addresses RC-2)

TRACEABILITY: Verified
- CR-042: CLOSED v2.0
- CR-043: CLOSED v2.0
- CR-043-VAR-002: IN_EXECUTION v1.0 (authorizes modifications)

PLACEHOLDERS: Execution-phase placeholders in Sections 7-9 are appropriate per SOP-003 Section 5 (sections editable during execution)

NO TYPOS OR FORMATTING ERRORS FOUND.
